DOC.brief_summary: This single-arm, open-label, multicenter, observational study will evaluate the efficacy and safety of Avastin (bevacizumab) in patients with glioblastoma multiforme in first or second relapse. Data will be collected from eligible patients initiated on Avastin treatment according to local label for up to 3 years.
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study of Avastin (Bevacizumab) in Patients With Glioblastoma Multiforme in First or Second Relapse
DOC.criteria: Adults patients, >/= 18 years of age Histologically confirmed glioblastoma multiforme in first or second relapse Patients not qualifying for Avastin treatment as per local label
